entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR THIS EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 50
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS AROUND 40
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
